sentences.sContent: ‘Anyone else would have done the same thing,’ he said with typical modesty.
sentences.sCn: 换了谁都会这么做的。”他带着一贯的谦虚说道。

sentences.sContent: There were shrieks of embarrassment as the girls struggled to protect their modesty.
sentences.sCn: 竭力保持着端庄形象的女孩们发出了尴尬的尖叫。

words.tran: 谦虚的，谦逊的；适度的；端庄的；羞怯的

trans.tranOther: the fact of not talking much about your abilities or possessions
